description: Bringing new meaning to “breakfast of champions,” veterans Rob & Patrick have heartily pledged to employ out-of-work veterans and serve the bustling commuters of Boston with deliciously hearty breakfast sandwiches. Exclusively using military-level efficiency and top-quality ingredients, these guys have developed a simple yet superb menu featuring three sandwiches:The General- Smoked Bacon, Muenster Cheese, and Two Fried Eggs on a Portuguese Roll. The Captain- Savory Pork Breakfast Sausage, Muenster Cheese, and Fried Eggs on a Portuguese Roll The Luey- Light and tasty Egg Whites, Spinach, Red Peppers, and Onions. A portion of the profits go to the New England Center and Home for Veterans, so no matter which yummy sandwich you choose, you’ll be starting your day off the right way. Be sure to stop by and give a Morning Salute to the troop at this truck for their honorable and incredible service.
name: Morning Salute
